p.d: A retired midwife is killed at home. Was this a burglary gone wrong? The victim was a former politician. Perhaps an act of political vengeance? Margot and Arthur believe there's something else. A hunch which is confirmed when they learn that she lied to her daughter about her origins. Directed by: Jérôme Navarro (season 2, France, 2016) Screenplay: Anton Voyl Cast: Vanessa David (Margot Laurent), Julien Baumgartner (Arthur du Plessis), Christian Rauth (Stavros), Nathalie Blanc (the public prosecutor), Maud Forget (Garnier) Genre: detective
